title: Why cant my Pixel 3 cannot connect to my cars bluetooth "hands free link"
content:
This has been soo annoying! if your pixel phone connects to your car but you cant controll songs wit the steering wheel you need to go into devloper setting chnage your blue tooth level to 1.3
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/88282223?hl=en&msgid=88282223
